text:
Chandanapally is a village in the Kodumon subdivision in Pathanamthitta district of Kerala, India. The town is famous for Chandanappally Valiyapally and St.George Catholic Church
Health centre.
The main hospital is Primary Health Center Chandanapally. There are three doctors available and 24 beds.
